sentences.sentence: You’ve got such promise, yet you’re squandering it on malice.
sentences.translation: 你很有前途，可是你却将之浪费在恶意揣测上。

sentences.sentence: Clearly, we cannot afford to keep squandering so much of our talent.
sentences.translation: 很显然，我们不能再继续这样浪费如此多的人才了——我们承受不起！

sentences.sentence: I used to be simply an epicurean squandering life under the eyes of Death.
sentences.translation: 我不过是一个生活在死亡面前的享乐主义者。
